dcterms:description: The Tower of Hano¨ı game is used to study the initiation of voluntary requests for help in a child-robot interaction setting, focusing on children's trajectories of problem-solving and their needs for exploratory actions.
dcterms:title: Tower of Hano¨ı game

dcterms:creator: R. S. Sutton
dcterms:description: The Tower of Hano¨ı game is referenced in the context of Q-learning, where a Q-learning algorithm is evaluated on its ability to solve the task.
dcterms:title: Tower of Hano¨ı game

dcterms:description: The states of the Tower of Hano¨ı game are referenced in the appendix, providing a graphical representation of all possible states for the game with 3 disks.
